author: makortel
body:
Backport of #22413 to help phase1 FastSim tracking backporting. Original description

> I noticed that
> 
> ```python
> a = cms.PSet(b = cms.PSet(c = ...))
> d = a.clone(b=dict(c=None))
> ```
> 
> did not remove `d.b.c`. This PR adds a unit test for this case and attempts to fix it.

Tested in 9_4_10, no changes expected.

@angirar @ssekmen @pmaksim1
title: Fix a.clone(b=dict(c=None)) (94X)
